title: Fix your clubs and Feed your hamsters.
body: Horrible disconnection ever freaking 10 minutes. Also I still don't have my club

replies.body:
Clubs issues have been resolved for most players, so I recommend submitting a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist you with resolving yours.

As for your disconnection issues, they're most likely caused by something local to your computer/network. Since this is the most common technical issue in League, we've consolidated a list of steps that resolve these issues inside our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), so I'd recommend giving those steps a whack.

Let me know if you continue to experience these issues after taking those steps.

I do appreciate you actually responding to this here thread, I really only made this out of anger and I do apologize for that. I have been unable to connect to my Club for some time now, I'll submit a ticket about it. Thanks
